casebody.data:
YANKTON SIOUX TRIBE OF INDIANS v. THE UNITED STATES No. 332-D

[224 Ct. Cl. 62,

623 F. 2d 159]

On August 8, 1980, the court awarded attorneys’ fees to Patricia L. Brown of the law firm of Wilkinson, Cragun and Barker, in the amount of $72,061.59 and reimbursement of expenses of $939.75, for a total award of $73,001.34.
